main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in San Jose, California on 1 October 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for three hours and was reported to be smaller than Venus,The object was seen moving stationary in the sky,The light from the object was flashing red,The report suggests that the object moved southeast and was likely a celestial object affected by atmospheric conditions,The sighting included multiple witnesses, estimated to be 20 to 30.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object flashing red
